message.body:
Jenna Good morning. i hope you are doing good. I saw something last night that you need to do. the web site|app is scholly.com. use my credit card to pull down the app and pay the 2.99 fee to find scholarships. last what is the concert and cost of tix that bun and kk want to go to? do you get discounts through school?
love you bird..
Aight, I'm in the middle of a very important film competition, but I'll look at all of this Monday. Love you.
ok but deadlines are approaching quickly and some have passed. it is important that you do this to be able to pay for college in order to keep going.....
